tags: None
review: Doctor Mutyalata was not just knowledgeable but also very kind. She instantly put me at ease and she was the first Gynae I have visited. I am definitely going to recommend her to others. If you are thinking of consulting a gynae she is the right person to go to.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Myself Darshini..I highly recommend the Doctor.After we started planning for a baby we thought of consulting a gynecologist. So I visited the clinic regarding this.. at the same time I was suffering from vagina itching. she was so patient, listened to my problems and just  prescribed me a wash for vaginal infection. Unlike my previous doctors who gave high dosage tablets which are of no use. then she asked me to visit after a week regarding my pregnancy issue. and gave me some tablets which helped in increasing my egg counts. I followed all her instructions and in just 2 months I skipped my periods and tested positive. she took care of me so very well throughout my pregnancy and delivered my baby. on the delivery day also she was very supportive she built my confidence level. I was so panic but she managed everything perfectly with a smiling face. I can say just like a family member. now me and my baby are doing well. A very special thanks to Dr. Mutyalatha. Thank you so much mam for your kindness and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: As a person with anxiety and depression, I am always wary and a little paranoid about my illness but the doctor was amazingly patient with my queries and anxieties. I was fully recovered from UTI and yeast infection. Kudos to her concern for her patients. Would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I highly recommend this doctor to all my friends and neighbours.I visited mutya latha mam for my mother's surgery. Starting from first consultation till the completion of surgery she took care like a family member.Not only she made my mother tension free from surgery, she was always very clear in instructions for us  and to hospital staff also. My mother is all well now.thank you madam for the excellent treatment and caring attitude.
reply_text: Thank you dear. Am so grateful that you trusted me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I consulted the doctor for my PCOS related problems.She was patient, understanding and offered me valuable advice.Unlike my previous experiences with certain doctors who added to my woes but prescribing all kinds of medication, she was just the opposite.She reduced my dosages and asked me to concentrate on losing weight which I believe plays a big role in improving PCOS.
I am extremely happy that I approached her and would definitely recommend her to all women with gynae issues.
reply_text: thanks Alak for the kind feedback.  wish you all the best for future

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am taking this opportunity to thank mutya latha mam for her wonderful treatment.
I was diagnosed with ectopic pregnancy last month. My first doctor advised surgery. I got really scared and visited mutya latha doctor after my colleague suggested her. She examined me, advised some blood tests and scan. She said according to reports  my problem can be treated with injections and advised strict follow up for 2 weeks. I completely trusted her because she explained everything so well and didn't make me panic. Today my blood tests and scan showed that ectopic pregnancy is almost resolved and I am feeling perfectly ok...thank you so ooo much mam ....recommend everyone to visit her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ***** ****  ** ***** ********** 
Good atmosphere. Very courteous, polite, soft spoken staff. They have  excellent Doctors and Experienced Doctors.
The doctors top of the range. Very experienced *** ************** Took their time to explain every small detail. I am extremely glad that I chose M M Healthcare
Dr Mutyalatha are fantastic and always to the point which helped a lot in understanding certain key issues in the treatment.
The prices are very reasonable
Good atmosphere,
Overall it is good experience. 
I would recommend to friends and family. Keep up the good work guys. 
Hats off to you all.
reply_text: thank you  for your positive feedback.   all the best

really appreciate her dedication towards work.
